				//Disable right mouse click Script
									
				function clickIE4(){
				if (event.button==2){
				return false;
				}
				}
				
				function clickNS4(e){
				if (document.layers||document.getElementById&&!document.all){
				if (e.which==2||e.which==3){
				return false;
				}
				}
				}

				document.captureEvents(Event.MOUSEDOWN);
